short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: American Red Cross eBDR Chrome Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Internal Chrome Extension for American Red Cross Collections - Pre Deployment.  To address specific requirements, this extension will be deployed to Chrome OS devices.  The features include: not allowing two instances of the application to open, conversion to use an internal host name and not IP (used on the Windows devices), having a visual and audio alert for low battery, and event correct to address onscreen signature capture.
